text: This would be really helpful! I work mostly at night and the bright interface is quite harsh.
Agreed! Dark mode is a must-have feature in 2024.
Absolutely! Most of the apps I use daily have dark mode now.
Same issue here. The app worked fine before the update.
Experiencing this on Android as well. Please prioritize this fix!
This integration works great! Really happy with the implementation.
CSV export would save us so much time in our monthly reporting.
Keyboard shortcuts would definitely speed up my workflow!
